comments:
Description:
  When change the sub-dataset  of joint dataset, an error is thrown out

Steps to reproduce:
  1. new a report, set a dataset as DS_A and another dataset as DS_B
  2. In the joint dataset, set a filer row["DS_A:a"]>100
  3. preview and it is ok
  4. modify the joint dataset change the DS_B to the DS_C
  5. Save and preview
